name: Run Donny Run!
description: Run Donny Run! Is a game purely for fun by 2 friends called Kytan and Raptor the game started of as a fun idea and we ended up finishing it about half way but due to lack of motivation we paused the project, If the game gets some feedback we might resume development and Finish the game off, the game was orignally ment to be a mobile game so some features may seem a bit off. In the game you play as Donny who is your typical guy, who mistreated his car and now the car is Chasing him through the streets of the city, your job is to dodge obstacles and try get a high score while also collecting points, you can try run from the car but unless you can run forever the car eventually has to catch up to you and Donny meats his fate.
